theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Gene Expression and Epigenetic Regulation CR Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on CR modulation of gene expression networks, anti-oxidant and anti-inflammatory gene pathways, and epigenetic regulation impacting aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Gene Expression and Epigenetic Regulation CR Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Emphasizes CR prevention of age-associated DNA methylation changes and epigenetic remodeling in the brain.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Gene Expression and Epigenetic Regulation CR Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Highlights CR regulation of non-coding RNAs and chromatin stability affecting genome integrity and aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Gene Expression and Epigenetic Regulation CR Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes CR feminization of gene expression and modulation of conserved aging pathways including sirtuins and TOR.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Gene Expression and Epigenetic Regulation CR Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Details systemic CR effects on gene expression and physiological systems influencing aging and healthspan.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Gene Expression and Epigenetic Regulation CR Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on CR-induced metabolic reprogramming and gene expression changes in adipose tissue linked to longevity.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Gene Expression and Epigenetic Regulation CR Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes CR metabolic and hormonal modulation including mitochondrial efficiency and gene expression changes.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Gene Expression and Epigenetic Regulation CR Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Explains CR remodeling of cellular quiescence program and gene expression changes affecting yeast chronological aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Cellular Stress and Senescence Suppression CR Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on CR reducing cellular stress responses, suppressing senescence, and preserving brain cell populations.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Cellular Stress and Senescence Suppression CR Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Highlights CR induction of autophagy, reduction of oxidative stress, and neuroprotection in Alzheimer's disease.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Cellular Stress and Senescence Suppression CR Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes CR hormesis mechanisms enhancing cellular stress resistance and reducing oxidative and inflammatory damage.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Cellular Stress and Senescence Suppression CR Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Details CR reduction of oxidative stress, inflammation, and cancer risk via modulation of cellular stress pathways.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Cellular Stress and Senescence Suppression CR Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on CR-induced reduction of thyroid hormone T3 lowering metabolic rate and oxidative stress to slow aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Nutrient-Sensing and Metabolic Pathways CR Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Emphasizes CR modulation of nutrient and energy sensing pathways (mTOR, AMPK, sirtuins, IGF-1) affecting metabolism and aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Stem Cell and Niche Modulation CR Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on CR preservation of stem cell function via niche regulation, mTOR signaling, and autophagy induction.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Stem Cell and Niche Modulation CR Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes CR effects on stem cell aging through niche interactions and energy metabolism reduction to preserve function.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Hormesis and Cellular Subpopulation Selection CR Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on CR as a co-hormetic agent enhancing cellular stress resistance and selective preservation of proliferative cell subpopulations.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Hormesis and Cellular Subpopulation Selection CR Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes CR as an active hormetic stress response activating protective pathways and metabolic regulators to promote longevity.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Hormesis and Cellular Subpopulation Selection CR Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Discusses dietary restriction extending lifespan via hormesis-like mechanisms with genetic background modulating effects.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Circadian Clock and Metabolic Optimization CR Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on CR reprogramming circadian clock gene expression to optimize metabolism and physiological homeostasis.
